projects.imgAlt: image of the envelope used in the envelopes app
projects.name: Envelopes
projects.description: Collaboration with 2 of the same people as the Middle Earth Supplier. A budgeting app that allows users to create budget categories and then add or reduce money from each category. My contributions were mostly focused on the back-end. May 2021

projects.imgAlt: homepage screenshot of middle earth supplier
projects.name: Middle Earth Supplier
projects.description: Collaboration with 3 other programmers to build an online retail website with fictional products to demonstrate functionality and style. My contributions were mostly focused on the front-end/UX UI.  March 2021

projects.imgAlt: screenshot of the burger app home ppage
projects.name: Bob's Burger of the Day
projects.description: A solo full stack project. Users can input burger of the day suggestions which get saved in a MySQL database. Multiple routes were built to handle user input. April 2021

projects.imgAlt: Image of the homepage from the alpha investments website
projects.name: Alpha Investments
projects.description: A collaborative project with 4 other developers. An Investing website that displays company information, stock performance, and recent news. My contributions were manipulating api data to be displayed and coordinating the other elements into a single working page. February 2021

projects.name: Travel Quiz
projects.description: An example of a refactored version of the JS Quiz. Built as an example of what can be done with the starter code in less than a few hours. Takes user input to make travel destination suggestions. January 2021

projects.name: JS Quiz
projects.description: Foundation code for making quizzes. Can be easily refactored to meet a wide variety of quiz types. One of the first sites I ever made. It has a variety of different java script elements to make refactoring different types of quizzes possible. January 2021
